1402360.name: Gravitators Demo
1402360.description:
This is the demo for Gravitators, a Gravity Shooter game where you pilot ships and complete mission objectives to secure the future of humankind. Defend the Earth and travel through the galaxy to repel an alien invasion.

The demo includes the first 12 levels of the game, which can be played and replayed without any restrictions.

If you purchase the full version, any progress you've done in the demo will be preserved.
